articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Experts blamed persistently long waits for practical tests while the DVSA blamed better detection.
articles.title: Driving test cheating soars with use of headsets and impersonators

articles.description: The government has announced the details of its long-awaited Warm Homes Plan which promises to cut energy bills.
articles.title: UK households to get £15bn for solar and green tech to lower energy bills

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: At least 14 people are known to have been injured after a commuter train crashed between Gelida and Sant Sadurní.
articles.title: Driver killed and several injured after train derails near Barcelona, local media report

articles.description: The parliamentary commissioner for standards said Farage had apologised after missing the deadline for registering interests.
articles.title: Nigel Farage inadvertently breached MPs' financial rules 17 times, says watchdog

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Don't just focus on one activity - doing a variety every week gives you more health benefits, a study suggests.
articles.title: Why doing a mix of exercise could be the key to longer life

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Brooklyn's explosive post about Brand Beckham "has ruptured it from within", one commentator says.
articles.title: Beckham vs Peltz Beckham: How Brooklyn could torpedo the family brand

articles.description: It is the last set of monthly inflation figures before the next interest rate decision on 5 February.
articles.title: UK inflation rises to 3.4%, driven by tobacco and airfares

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The French leader drew attention for his rebuke of Trump's tariff threat - and also his choice of eyewear.
articles.title: Emmanuel Macron: Why was the French president wearing sunglasses indoors at Davos?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A farmer says she is "devastated" by a "disgusting" river of fly-tipped waste dumped down the side of a mountain.
articles.title: River of waste 'visible for miles' dumped on Bwlch Mountain

articles.description: The cup paled into comparison to the grand old trophy presented to the winning boys football team.
articles.title: Girls football team win tiny plastic cup as boys take home full-size trophy
